author: Grace Ashford, Eliza Shapiro, Emma G. Fitzsimmons
title: New York Ends Its Mask Mandate for Schools
description: Gov. Hochul said the statewide mask mandate in schools would end on Wednesday, and Mayor Adams planned to lift pandemic measures in the city on March 7.
content: The rollbacks came a day after New York announced a statewide seven-day average positivity rate below 2 percent and hospitalizations under 2,000 for the first time since before the Omicron surge. Theâ€¦ [+2674 chars]
